name: Analemma (itch)
description:
Hold space to produce a ring of energy and slow time

Try to hit both stars at the same time, at the center of your orbit

Each hit will increase both score and speed

You have thirty seconds

Space to start, 'R' at any time to restart

Music from Hooksounds.com; sounds from StumpyStrust at opengameart.org

(Created for MA Indie Game Design at Goldsmiths, UoL)
